title: Chelsea star Eden Hazard makes cheeky admission after Arsenal win: Fans will love this
text:
Chelsea star Eden Hazard makes cheeky admission after Arsenal win: Fans will love this EDEN HAZARD has made a cheeky admission about Chelseaâ€™s win over Arsenal. PUBLISHED: 04:20, Mon, Feb 6, 2017 | UPDATED: 04:22, Mon, Feb 6, 2017 
Chelsea romped to a 3-1 win over Arsenal on Saturday at Stamford Bridge. 
Marcos Alonso, Eden Hazard and Cesc Fabregas were all on target as the Blues took another step towards the title. 
The Blues make a trip to Burnley in the lunchtime kick off on Sunday (1:30pm). GETTY Eden Hazard reckons Chelsea were saving themselves for the Burnley game GETTY Cesc Fabregas didn't celebrate against his old club Chelsea player ratings from emphatic win over Arsenal Sat, February 4, 2017
